title: So slow downloading
body: I'm trying to download the PBE but its taking so long I'm already at 56% but I started it at 5:00 and its already 8:50. How can I make this go faster?

replies.body: Patching speed will depend on a few things: disk read/write speed, network connection, and how long it's been since you last patched. I'd recommend just walking away and letting it patch for a while until it finishes. If you run into any errors along the way, let me know.

Its open for everyone. Right? cause I'm trying to login into it but its saying error and I have all of my login information right but it still gives me an error. And I try to relaunch just now and it just reset the progress...(Edit) I just waited again but I still cant login in

The PBE is **not open for everyone**. It requires an invite being sent to you *after* you've [applied for access](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) and been accepted.

Let me know if you have any questions.
